message: Let's split it down the middle to start. Accept and we can call it a day!
You're starting high, I'll meet you in the middle. I'll take 6000 and you can have 4000. That's a fair deal.
That's a bit low for me. I'll need a better offer to accept.
I'll meet you in the middle, but I need a bit more. This is my best offer so far.
I'll take 5500 and you can have 4500. I think this is a fair split, considering the inflation.
I've already offered you 5500, and I'm not willing to go below that.
I'm not budging from 6000. Take it or leave it.
I'll take a bit more and leave you with 3500. I think this is a good compromise.
I'll stick to my guns on 6000. You're not getting the better deal here.
I'm not backing down. You're not getting more than 3500. Take it or leave it.
I'm willing to take a smaller share to get a better deal. I'll take 7000 and leave you with 3000. It's my final offer.
I'm not sure if I'll get a better deal later, so I'll accept your offer. 3000 is better than nothing at this point.
